description: The PAT_LIFETIME_MAX table contains information regarding patients' amounts credited toward lifetime maximum benefits (assuming the benefit plan is properly configured for tracking lifetime maximum benefits).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number within a multiple response or over time item

columns.name: LIFEMAX_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the carrier for which this set of lifetime maximum buckets is counting.

columns.name: LIFEMAX_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: LIFEMAX_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient has approached or exceeded the lifetime maximum limit for the carrier


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approaching


Exceeded

columns.name: LIFEMAX_BKT_MAN_IN
columns.description: Allows manual override of the lifetime maximum in-plan accumulated amount

columns.name: LIFEMAXBKT_MAN_OUT
columns.description: Allows manual override of the lifetime maximum out-of-plan accumulated amount

columns.name: LIFEMAXBKT_MAN_ALL
columns.description: Allows manual override of the lifetime maximum total accumulated amount

columns.name: LIFEMAXAPPR_CLM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record which caused the "approaching" flag to be set

columns.name: LIFEMAX_APP_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the approaching lifetime maximum flag was set

columns.name: LIFEMAX_BKT_IN
columns.description: The accumulated in-plan amount for claims paid under this carrier

columns.name: LIFEMAX_BUCKET_OUT
columns.description: The accumulated out-of-plan amount for claims paid under this carrier
